resources.string: Physics Engine used for simulating the world
How bouncy the object is: 1.0 (100) implies perfect elasticity, 0.0 implies complete rigidity
Force of resistance of an object when moving across another: 0.0 implies no friction, 1.0 (100) implies high friction
Density measured in (10^1 kg/m^3). Varies mostly within 30 â€“ 80 (Balsa ~16, Teak ~90)
Density measured in (10^2 kg/m^3). Aluminium ~26, Titanium ~45, Iron ~79, Lead ~113, Platinum ~215
How much the simulation time should be slowed down (default: 1x = no slowdown)
Number of floors of the wooden slab tower structure
Place a structure first and only after then you can hurdle a ball. Use the icons below.
